title: The Amazing Story of 28 Years of Growth & Accomplishment at SCUC-ISD
text:
Preface
This book tells the amazing story of the growth and accomplishments of the SCUC-ISD over the past 28 years, as illustrated through 154 plots and charts.

title: Introduction
text:
This is a book created from Quarto and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.
  




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: District Performance
text: Our goal in this part of the book is district performance.

title: Growth, Attendance, Attrition
text:
Let your eyes wander over these plots and get a sense of the growth and development of the district over the last 28 years. Using just your eyes you will gain an appreciation for the accomplishments and growth of the district.
  
Enjoy!
